document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA HOUSING AUTHORITY BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS AMENDMENT ACT OF 2010.

history.narrative: Law 18-334, the “District of Columbia Housing Authority Board of Commissioners Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-1005, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Workforce Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 23, 2010, and December 7, 2010, respectively. Enacted without signature of the Mayor on January 8, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-656 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-334 became effective on March 31, 2011.
